Title: The Scorpion King 3: Battle for Redemption
Writer: Brendan Cowles (screenplay), Shane Kuhn (screenplay), Randall McCormick (story)
Actors: Dave Bautista, Bostin Christopher, Tanapol Chuksrida, Kevin 'Kimbo Slice' Ferguson
Plot: Since his rise to power, Mathayus' kingdom has fallen. Now an assassin for hire, he must defend a kingdom from an evil tyrant and his ghost warriors for the chance to regain the power and glory he once knew.
